attributes.action: review the position of free trading in the e.u
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In november 2006 a trial attempt to get cigarettes ,tobacco,and drink from fellow e.u members on the internet was quashed by gordon brown i feel this is totally unfair to the man in the street who can purchase these items by going to e.u countries ,but disabled people etc who cannot travel are deprived of getting these concessions
